pages.text: Through the power of fire, the Hellish Bauble extinguishes any flames using some ME.$(br2)Note that this does not enable you to swim in the nether. The Bauble does not protect against direct damage from Lava.
Being made out of Netherite, the Bauble is completely fireproof.$(br2)You can equip this in the Necklace trinket slot.
